title: Serif font with the hollow bitween letters
tags: Font that similar or looks like Goudy Handtooled
content:
Anyone know this font?? It looks like Goudy Handtooled font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123613im_/http:/typophile.com/files/24277-The%20Imagery_5397.jpg)
author: artslons

comments.content: I'd say it's lettering, not a font. The strokes on the upper and lower lines are the same weight even though the letter sizes are different. And the inline strokes on the two Es are subtly different.
If you are happy with a similar font: [ITC Century Handtooled Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123613/http:/www.identifont.com/show?NG) …
